speaker: MULDER
line: We call it the miracle of life. Conception: A union of perfect opposites-- essence transforming into existence-- an act without which mankind would not exist and humanity cease to exist.

speaker: MULDER
line: Or is this just nostalgia now? An act of biology commandeered by modern science and technology? Godlike, we extract, implant, inseminate... and we clone.

speaker: MULDER
line: But has our ingenuity rendered the miracle into a simple trick? In the artifice of replicating life can we become the creator? Then what of the soul? Can it, too, be replicated? Does it live in this matter we call DNA? Or is its placement the opposite of artifice, capable only by God.

speaker: MULDER
line: How did this child come to be? What set its heart beating? Is it the product of a union? Or the work of a divine hand? An answered prayer? A true miracle? Or is it a wonder of technology-- the intervention of other hands? What do I tell this child about to be born? What do I tell Scully?

speaker: MULDER
line: And what do I tell myself?

speaker: CHRIS CARTER
line: Previously on the X-Files:

speaker: KNOWLE ROHRER
line: The invasion has begun.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What invasion?

speaker: KNOWLE ROHRER
line: They're already here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Billy Miles shed his skin and literally became a new person.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And I don't mean the same person.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: This is Duffy Haskell.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: My wife was a multiple abductee. Dr. Lev stole the alien baby out of her womb.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: I looked at this ultrasound you sent me. It looks fine to me, as does your own ultrasound. It's normal to be worried.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: They called me back into the FBI to poke holes in my story.

speaker: DR. LEV
line: As we knew they would.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Make sure Scully doesn't come to term.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You're out of your mind.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: She can't have that baby.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You're okay, Agent Scully. You're fine. Your baby's fine.

speaker: MULDER
line: Never give up on a miracle.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: You know, it would be a whole lot easier for everyone if you would just tell us the sex, Dana.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Did you hear me?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes, I heard you, Mom-- for about the thousandth time, you can wait. Didn't you have to wait with us?

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Well, I know it's a boy. I can just tell by the way you're carrying. It's a boy.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, see, you obviously don't need me to tell you because you already know.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Then it's a boy?

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Oh, it's the least you could tell your mother considering everything else you're keeping a secret.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We told people noon, right?

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Mm-hmm.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Hi. Your mom said to cover all the bases. I'm Lizzy Gill.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Hi, Lizzy. Let me give you a hand with that. I asked Lizzy to help out today.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh. Hi.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: These are going to need some water. Congratulations, by the way.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mom... what do we need help with?

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: I don't know. It's just, well you shouldn't have to worry. You have to let people do for you. She's a very highly recommended baby nurse, by the way.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, Mom.

speaker: SCULLY
line: This has got to be a conspiracy.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Aw... Maybe it'll be twins.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you, but I would settle for one very healthy boy.

speaker: WOMEN
line: Oh?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Or girl.

speaker: WOMEN
line: Aww!

speaker: OLDER WOMAN
line: So many secrets, Margaret.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: What do you expect? My daughter works for the FBI.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Oh! Oh, dear!

speaker: LIZZY
line: I got it. Here. Moving in... the white tornado.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Thank you, Lizzy.

speaker: LIZZY
line: No problem.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: Just think about it.

speaker: DR. LEV
line: Excuse me? Can I help you?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Dr. Lev, isn't it?

speaker: DR. LEV
line: I'm sorry. I don't know who you are or how you got in here but we don't allow visitors.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: I won't be visiting long. I've just come to verify it's true.

speaker: DR. LEV
line: Verify that what's true?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: That your work's been fruitful. I can see that it has by the abomination you're holding in your hands.

speaker: DR. LEV
line: You'll have to leave now.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Your work here is done.

speaker: MIKE THE NASCAR ANNOUNCER
line: Dale Jarrett right in the pack battling hard against Ricky Craven for seventh place. Jeff?

speaker: JEFF THE NASCAR ANNOUNCER
line: Yeah, Mike, I was down in the 88 car pit when Dale Jarrett came in. His car was just a little bit on the tight side still. Steve Allen, the gas man, took one round out of the left rear. They said if they can get the car to free up a little bit more...

speaker: JEFF THE NASCAR ANNOUNCER
line: … he'll be a force to contend with before the end of the day. Now, Phil Davis has...

speaker: DOGGETT
line: The last person I'd expect to see knocking on my door on a Saturday morning-- Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: You can drop the "Agent," Agent Doggett. It's just plain old Fox Mulder now.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Right. You want to come in, Fox? I was just watching a race.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's what I was doing. Slightly different race though.

speaker: MIKE THE NASCAR ANNOUNCER
line: ... from sixth place on back.

speaker: JEFF THE NASCAR ANNOUNCER
line: Boy, that 32 car is really...

speaker: NEWSCASTER
line: ... exclusive footage of a medical research clinic in Germantown, Maryland, which burned down last night in what firefighters characterize as an accelerated blaze. Accelerated because of the white-hot intensity of the fire, which officials are now calling a definite case of arson.

speaker: MULDER
line: Zeus Genetics. That ring a bell?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Yeah. That's where Scully believed they were doing tests on women-- putting alien babies in them or something like that-- against their will. Wasn't ever completely explained.

speaker: MULDER
line: Looks like somebody's attempt to make sure it never will be.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I'd say that's more than an attempt. Looks like there's going to be nothing left.

speaker: MULDER
line: I think that's the idea-- to cover up the kind of research that was going on there. That's why I came to talk to you.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What do you want from me?

speaker: MULDER
line: How about a ride?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Hey, Gene.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Not the way I want to be spending my Saturday afternoon, John. I had to leave my kid's ball game.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Sorry about that. I didn't say you had to come do it yourself.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Fire Marshall thought I was kidding when I told him I wanted to sift all this. Seeing it, I thought I was kidding, too.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: He put you onto this, didn't he? What the hell are you doing, John? You don't have to answer to him. He's out of the Bureau.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Well, he thinks there's something here.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: I'm certain there is. Just not anything the FBI needs to be looking for.

speaker: MULDER
line: Agent Doggett?

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey, I hope you don't mind me dropping your name with the local PD. They just told me that they contacted everyone at Zeus Genetics except for one man-- a Dr. Lev-- a founder, and head of clinical research.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: And what? You think we're going to find his body here in the ashes?

speaker: MULDER
line: That would probably stand to reason.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What is it exactly we're looking for being I'm starting to piss a lot of people off, Mr. Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Pissing people off comes with the territory, Agent Doggett. It's part of working on the X-Files.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Well, at the risk of pissing you off I think I've wasted about enough of my weekend.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey, I told you Dr. Lev was a founder of the clinic. Would you like to know who his cofounder was? Dr. Parenti. Agent Scully's obstetrician through the first two-thirds of her pregnancy.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: And you think he burned down this clinic?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know, but if I'm the Agent assigned to the X-Files, I sure as hell would want to ask him. Worst it could do is piss him off.

speaker: MULDER
line: Knock, knock.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Right. We get caught in here what are you going to say then?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'll just say I'm with you, Agent Doggett. It's Saturday anyway, right? We're just having a look around.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Hey, Mulder.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Who are you?

speaker: MULDER
line: Me?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Yes, you, sir. What do you think you're doing in this office?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm with an FBI agent who would like to ask you the exact same question. Dr. Parenti, isn't it?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: I'm in the middle of a very delicate medical procedure. Whatever you want, you don't just come barging in here. I don't care who you are.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: This medical procedure... it have anything to do with this?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Please...

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Why don't you tell us what we're looking at here, Dr. Parenti?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: You people have no right to be here. I want you to leave.

speaker: MULDER
line: What is this? Some kind of showroom?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Do you know what I've been through in the past 24 hours? Close friend and colleague is missing. Much of my life's work has been destroyed.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: How about you explain what you are doing? What these things are.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: They are what we are all working so hard to prevent-- children with non-survivable birth defects.

speaker: MULDER
line: Does that work include experimentation with alien embryos? Work that you would destroy to cover up such allegations?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Where do you get these ideas?

speaker: MULDER
line: From a friend of mine-- a former patient of yours-- Dana Scully.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: If I'm such a Dr. Frankenstein how is it that Ms. Scully is carrying a perfectly healthy child? In her own medical opinion.

speaker: MULDER
line: Is she?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I'd say this man's suitably pissed off. Why don't we let him get back to work. Let's go, Mulder.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Thank you.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: Dana?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mmm, hmm-mm...

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: Oh, sorry.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Horse pills.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: I'm about to leave. Your dinner's in the oven. And I just wanted to say that I hope this is working out. I know it's important to your Mom.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It is. And, uh... I appreciate your help. I didn't quite realize, uh... how much I needed it.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: Well, I'll see you.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: How's it going? You look unsure.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: No. I think she trusts me.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: Good. We're almost at the end.

speaker: MULDER
line: You found something, didn't you?

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: You still answering to him?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: We found teeth and a porcelain bridge. We're waiting on Dr. Lev's dental records to make positive ID.

speaker: MULDER
line: Anything else?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Unidentifiable biological material fused with laboratory grade silica.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I know what you're thinking. But there's lots here that's unidentifiable. Doesn't mean it's alien.

speaker: MULDER
line: Let's ask Dr. Parenti … if it's okay with Agent Crane.

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: Hello? Hello?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Packing, Dr. Parenti?

speaker: DR. PARENTI
line: I'm sorry. This office is closed.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Yes, it is.

speaker: MULDER
line: The man loves his work.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Dr. Parenti?

speaker: MULDER
line: Agent Doggett. Look at this.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Dr. Parenti.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Dr. Parenti.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What the hell is that?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Hey, Mulder.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Mulder, better come see this.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Mulder?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Right there! Don't move! Stop! Stop there!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Stop there or I'll shoot!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hold still, Mulder. This should just about do it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Ahh! Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sorry.

speaker: MULDER
line: I see why you gave up a career in medicine for the FBI, Scully. You've got manos de piedra.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sorry.

speaker: MULDER
line: Imagine if he'd really connected.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who?

speaker: MULDER
line: Billy Miles.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Billy Miles? He did this?

speaker: MULDER
line: Ask Agent Doggett. He saw him.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: If you ask me, the kid was whacked out on something. Whatever it was, he's feeling no pain.

speaker: MULDER
line: Ask me, the kid isn't a kid.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Oh, don't tell me he's an alien.

speaker: MULDER
line: He is a type of alien. A human replacement. One who looks human. Look at his strength. The way he took those slugs.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I've seen plenty of guys whacked out on chemicals, keep on coming.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, then, you're ignoring who Billy Miles is. You, of all people, Agent Doggett who's supposedly running the X-Files.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You're ignoring the fact that he bled red blood. Now, every single X-File I read-- and I read them all, Mulder-- what you call "aliens" bleed green, right?

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, Billy Miles is a whole new deal. He's an alien abductee who was returned after hideous procedures were performed on him. And who miraculously returns to so-called perfect health when his body completely sheds its skin.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Same thing happened to you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Same thing would've happened to me if I'd been left alone.

speaker: MULDER
line: If Scully hadn't treated me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What I want to know is what Billy Miles was doing at that medical office.

speaker: MULDER
line: Same as when he torched Zeus Genetics and destroyed their experiments with alien biology and the doctors performing them.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And what were you doing there, … …Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Looking for answers.

speaker: SCULLY
line: To what?

speaker: MULDER
line: One of those doctors was your doctor.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: MULDER
line: Listen, Scully, I'm sorry, but I just need to know that this baby of yours is going to be all right.

speaker: SCULLY
line: My baby is fine, Mulder. I've had it checked over and over again with my new doctor that I trust implicitly.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: Oh, I'm sorry, Dana. I didn't...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Come on in, Lizzy. It's all right. We just need some space to talk.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: It's okay. I've got plenty to do. Excuse me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's okay. She's just helping me out here at my mother's insistence.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's... that's all I'm trying to do. Just make sure nothing happens to you; that this baby you're carrying is born without any surprises.

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: Hi. It's me. We've got trouble.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: Where are you?

speaker: LIZZY GILL
line: I'm at her apartment. She's with her two partners. They're asking all the right questions.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: Lizzy, listen to me. She trusts you. You've got to play to that. You have to keep a cool head.

speaker: DUFFY HASKELL
line: Who are you?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Assistant Director.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Heads have been rolling, Agent Doggett, all in your direction. PD got the call. Passer-by saw the door of the building wide open. Name of the victim flagged a previous FBI investigation.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Duffy Haskell.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yeah. Came to see you and Scully on a case involving pregnant women carrying alien babies. Coroner says that the way his neck is severed defies logic and use of any conventional-type weapon.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What is this place?

speaker: SKINNER
line: An illegal medical facility for the purpose of human cloning. It goes on from here. In fact, it occupies the entire warehouse.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You read about these things but you don't imagine they exist.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yeah, just like aliens.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Come on, what are you saying? That that's what was going on here? That they're making alien babies?

speaker: SKINNER
line: No, nobody's saying that, Agent Doggett. At least not yet. But what I do have to tell you is not going to put your mind any more at ease. We found prenatal records here. A Dr. Lev and a Dr. Parenti working with this Duffy Haskell monitoring Scully's pregnancy.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: This Dr. Parenti, it's true he's one of Scully's doctors but from everything I know, Scully's checked out fine.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You seem to be missing the point.

speaker: MULDER
line: And what point would that be?

speaker: MULDER
line: What?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Talk to you a minute?

speaker: MULDER
line: You said there'd been a murder.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yeah, we'll get there. Some business we need to clear up. Personal business. About Scully's baby, about who the father is.

speaker: MULDER
line: Ahh... Yeah, I hear there's a pool running down at the FBI, placing bets.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I've had my suspicions. That is, until I found out that you had questions. Questions about Scully's pregnancy itself.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want to know who the father is, that's Scully's business. But if you're asking me how a woman who was diagnosed as barren and unable to conceive is about to give birth in a couple days, that's an answer I can't honestly give.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Well, I need answers. In light of what we found in there and in light of Scully's due date I need good, hard answers. Fast.

speaker: MULDER
line: Sir, just... Let me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Lizzy, are you going to get that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Lizzy?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hello?

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey, Scully, it's me. Are you all right?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah. I just ran from the shower.

speaker: MULDER
line: I need to see you. I've got Skinner with me. It's not something that can really wait.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's about your pregnancy. Skinner's got some questions based on some new information.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What...? Mulder, what are you talking about?

speaker: MULDER
line: Evidence of interference by someone.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you doing? What do you think you're doing with these?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who are you? Who are you?!

speaker: DR. SPEAKE
line: I want you to know you can stop worrying, Dana. Your baby is fine.

speaker: DR. SPEAKE
line: Everything is absolutely as it should be, 100%. The pills you were worried about were just vitamin supplements. Nothing harmful. Nothing you'd be afraid to give any expectant mother. I know it doesn't make sense but it's a relief, I'm sure.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: I am so sorry, Dana. I brought Lizzie into your home. This is all my fault.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: I'm so sorry. You know I'd never let anything happen to you. I'd never knowingly let anybody hurt you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I know, Mom.

speaker: MARGARET SCULLY
line: I'm so worried about you. You keep everything so bottled up.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder! How is she?

speaker: MULDER
line: She's fine, according to her doctor. Apparently, it was a false alarm. Whatever this woman was up to...

speaker: SKINNER
line: Well, we won't be able to hold the woman based on those findings. But Agent Doggett's been talking to her. I think you ought to hear what she has to say.

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: I knew people would kill for what I know but … not like this.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Not going to let that happen. Just what you told me and Agent Crane.

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: For the past ten years I've been working as a research scientist trying to produce human clones-- long before the media circus with sheep and cows. The work was painstaking, largely unsuccessful but there was a lot of interest and a lot of money.

speaker: MULDER
line: Money from who?

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: Orders came from government men. But they're all dead now.

speaker: MULDER
line: But the work continued.

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: We were surprisingly successful with a clone from a human egg and alien DNA. DNA that the government had since 1947.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What do you mean by success?

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: Alien babies. Birthed by human mothers desperate to conceive. They didn't live more than a couple of days, but tissue and stem cells is what we were after for other experiments.

speaker: MULDER
line: What other experiments?

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: I don't know anything about that. But I know it was something good.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did you do to Scully?

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: We were trying to protect her.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did you do to her?!

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: No, you don't understand.

speaker: MULDER
line: Tell me what's wrong with her! Tell me what's wrong with her baby!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Listen to her. What she's saying.

speaker: LIZZIE GILL
line: There's nothing wrong with her. That's what I'm trying to tell you. The child she is carrying is very special. One could only hope to create that in a lab. A perfect human child but with no human frailties.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Mulder!

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Agent Doggett! I got something, John. This guy Billy Miles called in from a Dr. Parenti's office. He wants to give himself up.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: All right, let's get over there.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What's wrong?

speaker: MULDER
line: You here alone?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes. My Mom just went to the...

speaker: MULDER
line: Whatever you can't get elsewhere, just throw it together.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, to go where? No, just stop! Can you tell me what's wrong? Is it something to do with my baby?

speaker: MULDER
line: No, your, your baby is fine. It's you who's in danger now, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: From who? Mulder, from what?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know, I'm not sure. I'm not sure about anything. I just know I got to get you out of here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Look, Mulder, look, I can't take this! I can't live like this—as, as the object of some unending X-File.

speaker: MULDER
line: This isn't about the X-Files, Scully. It is only about you. Now, you are going to have this baby and I'm going to do everything I can to protect it. I just can't do that here.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Billy Miles! Billy... Billy Miles.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Agent Doggett. Anything?

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It's John Doggett. I'm at Dr. Parenti's office. Billy Miles called us looking to turn himself in, only he ain't here.

speaker: MULDER
line: Agent Doggett...

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I know. Something's wrong. Something doesn't make any sense.

speaker: MULDER
line: Leave the suitcase.

speaker: MULDER
line: Get in, go around.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, lock your door.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't think that matters much, Scully.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: We haven't got much time. Get in.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Let's go!

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You should all know exactly what it is you're up against... what Agent Scully's up against.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You realize you're all listening to someone who tried to kill me. He left you for dead. personally.]

speaker: MULDER
line: Tell us about Billy Miles.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: There are others just like him. You can call them what you want. They're human replacements, alien replicants. They're virtually unstoppable.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What do they want?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: They want to knock out any and all attempts by us to survive the final days- - when they come back to retake the planet.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: So, what, they're wandering around among us … looking for trouble? Some kind of alien lawmen?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You saw what they did to those doctors. They're fearless. And they answer to no one except their own biological imperative … to survive.

speaker: MULDER
line: What about Scully? What do they want with her?

speaker: SCULLY
line: They want my baby.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: They didn't even know about it. I don't know exactly how they could have found out just how... how important it is... how special.

speaker: SCULLY
line: My baby is normal.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Your baby was a miracle. Born of a barren mother's barren womb.

speaker: MULDER
line: Are you saying that they're afraid of it?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: They're afraid of its implications. That it could somehow be greater than them. Something... more human than human.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't believe this.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You wanted to destroy her child.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: I wanted to destroy the truth before they learn the truth.

speaker: MULDER
line: That there's a God... a higher power.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I don't believe this crap; I don't believe you're all sitting around here listening to it even when you know this man's a liar. Worse than that.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You can believe what you want but I don't think you can take the chance that I'm wrong.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: There is no hospital that's safe enough. She may never even make it out of this building.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Why don't you just shut up?

speaker: MULDER
line: Agent Doggett. Get on the phone. If we're going to get Scully out of here we're going to need some help.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Doggett? Agent Doggett, can you hear me? I'm in the cab on my way from the airport.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I'll meet you down in the parking garage. I have a car there waiting for you.

speaker: REYES
line: Where are we going?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I'll tell you when you get here.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: If I'm so full of crap, why all the precautions?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Precisely because you are so full of crap, Krycek.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Your ass stays here.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Doggett, where are you?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Coming around to you.

speaker: REYES
line: Stop the car.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Go. Get out of here.

speaker: REYES
line: I'm guessing I don't have time to go to the little girls' room?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Okay, bring her down.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Mulder, Skinner, he's in the garage!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Go back! Go back!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Get back in the elevator!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: He's on the stairs coming up.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Hey, look who's back.

speaker: SKINNER
line: He's in the building.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: What do you want me to do?

speaker: MULDER
line: You're going to protect her.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Drive safely.

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Go!

speaker: AGENT CRANE
line: Go!
